five_year.Top Tier Stable: Consistently in the top 10-15 across all recent years. Elite names with minimal variation and extremely stable popularity.
five_year.Steady Performer: Present all five years with consistent rankings in top 100. Reliable choices maintaining their position year after year.
five_year.Rising Star: Strong upward momentum with significant improvement over the period. Names gaining substantial popularity in recent years.
five_year.New Entrant: First appeared in rankings within the last 3 years. Fresh names gaining initial traction and building presence.
five_year.Fading: Experiencing significant decline in popularity over recent years. Names losing favor with substantial downward trends.
five_year.Volatile: Unpredictable patterns with significant year-to-year swings. Names showing multiple ranking changes without clear direction.
five_year.One-Hit Wonder: Brief appearance in rankings for only 1-2 years. Names with fleeting popularity that didn't sustain momentum.
five_year.Dominant Force: In top 10 for most or all recent years. The absolute elite tier of current popularity.
five_year.Unknown: Insufficient recent data to determine a clear trend. Either never ranked or appeared only sporadically.

recent.Perennial Favorite: Consistently high popularity across decades. Timeless appeal with stable demand.
recent.Modern Hit: Strong sustained popularity with continued growth. Already well-established and still gaining momentum.
recent.Moderate Classic: Steady popularity maintained across generations. Reliable presence with gradual upward trend.
recent.Rising Star: Dramatic growth with strong upward momentum. Rapidly gaining popularity and visibility.
recent.Rapid Riser: Explosive growth from minimal presence. Rising trajectory showing rapid adoption.
recent.Rising Uncommon: Growing steadily from rare to uncommon. Building momentum with positive trajectory.
recent.Emerging Rare Names: Slow growth from minimal levels. Gaining traction but still very rare overall.
recent.Fading Mega-Hit: Former blockbusters showing significant decline. Historical favorites experiencing reduced usage.
recent.Declining Former Favorite: Well-established names experiencing downward trajectory. Strong past presence now fading.
recent.Fading Classic: Fell from popular status below 500 average. Strong historical presence now diminished.
recent.Declining Uncommon: Approached popularity threshold but declining. Once moderately common, now less frequent.
recent.Extremely Rare: Very low usage with slight decline. Typically under 10 babies per year at peak.
recent.Almost Unique: Minimal usage remaining stable. Rare cultural or unique names with very small presence.
recent.Uncategorized recent pattern: Does not fit clearly into any defined classification pattern

historic.Fallen Classic: Long-term favourite recently dropped from the rankings
historic.Recent Entrant: New to top 100, emerged in 2000s or later
historic.Vintage Revival: Names from the 20th century that have returned to popularilty
historic.Pendulum: Swinging in and out of fashion
historic.Lost Generation: Popular in early decades, no longer in top 100
historic.Uncategorized: Does not fit clearly into any defined classification pattern
